title.narrative: High value opportunity - Danish Model Farm China - Pig Production

description.narrative:
The overall objective of this project is to create a Danish model of pig production. The project is designed to showcase the Danish competences within the field of efficient and environmentally sustainable pig production. Danish companies will be able to use the Danish model pig farm as a showcase and a vehicle to demonstrate their capabilities, products, services and know-how to relevant and interested Chinese clients and partners and thus be able to accelerate the export of more equipment, technology, know-how etc.
The establishment of a model pig production farm, will contribute to the knowledge among Chinese pig producers. It will thereby help the Chinese production become more efficient and environmental friendly.
The closed slurry disposal system will use slurry as organic fertilizer and thereby contribute to the public environment and avoid pollution to the air, water and soil by saving chemical fertilizer
